evidence.title: Forecast
evidence.snippet: Analyst target of $6.00 implies roughly 42% upside from the $4.20 price in early Dec 2025; consensus rating Strong Buy.

evidence.title: RR Stock Fundamental Analysis - Financial Scores & Performance Indicators of Rolls-Royce Holdings plc
evidence.snippet: Financial dashboard shows Q2 2024 revenue about 4.43B and other balance sheet metrics; earnings update scheduled Jul 30, 2025.

evidence.title: Profile
evidence.snippet: Richtech Robotics Inc. builds service robots and filed multiple SEC reports through Sep 2025; trades on NASDAQ as RR.
